title: [Extension Proposal] Generate AsyncApi-doc by scanning for annotations

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

[AsyncApi](https://www.asyncapi.com/) specifies a way to describe asynchronous communication (like [OpenApi](https://www.openapis.org/) does for REST-Apis).

This extension will provide similar functionality for asynchronous communication, like OpenApi/Swagger does for REST-APIs:

- It will scan a Quarkus project for asynchronous communication using the microprofile annotations like` @Channel, @Incoming and @Outgoing`, generating an [AsyncApi-Object](https://github.com/asyncapi/jasyncapi) 
- The result can be filtered / post-processed
- The filtered-result will be stored as a file which can be 
  - downloaded as yaml or json
  - viewed directly in a html-page (like [here](https://studio.asyncapi.com/))


Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).
